data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Faúndez, Eduardo I., Rocca, Javiera R. (2017): A new species of Oncopeltus Stål, 1868 (Heteroptera: Lygaeidae) in the nominate subgenus from Ecuador. Zootaxa 4238 (2): 249-252, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4238.2.4|3 occurrences
